Panel Header Image Remove image Select new image Image Default Nothing selected Select App Theme Blue (Light) Blue (Dark) Green (Light) Black Ics Red Dark Black Dark Green (Dark) Red (Light) Red (Dark) Orange (Light)) Orange (Dark) Purple (Light)) Purple (Dark) Brown (Light)) Amber (Dark) Gren-Ora. (Light)) Blue Grey Light Black Light
Root permission is needed to carry out build prop demo!! Current value = %1$s Build Prop Simulator blah ..... Restarting app for the options to get the new build prop property value Panel Header Bg Select Image using.. Error processing image An error occurred while running the associated script Apply Backup Restore Restoring and synchronizing %1$s preferences and files.... You can sort the items by long pressing an item, dragging and dropping it the desired position.\r\nThe delete buttom (X) deletes all the current selected items.\r\nThe add button (+) allows to add a new item.\r\nThe last button you see allows you to sort all items in alphabetic order.\r\nOnce an app is selected, swipping it to the right you can delete the item To change the color click on the item you want to modify.\r\nYou can sort the items by long pressing an item, dragging and dropping it the desired position.\r\nThe delete buttom (X) deletes all the current selected items.\r\nThe add button (+) allows to add a new item.\r\nThe last button you see allows you to sort all items in alphabetic order.\r\nOnce an app is selected, swipping it to the left will allow you to copy the current color to the clipboard. Swipping it to the right allows you to delete the item. You can quick delete a selection in the main screen by swipping it left in the list and the option to delete the item will appear.\nnTo place an item in other position just long press it and drag it to the desired position.nTo add or delete elements use the + / - button.\nIf you want to delete all your current selection just press the X button. You can quick delete a selection in the main screen by swipping it left in the list and the option to delete the item will appear.\nClick on the element to edit it.\nClick on + - button to add elements. \nIf you want to delete all your current selection just press the X button.\nYou can sort the list dragging the elements.\nIf you select an existing app it will be updated Help Application help Back Select Application Creaing and sorting list .. Creating applications list… ( %1$s is not installed! ) Delete values Reset values Delete selected values. Are you sure? Reset to default values. Are you sure? %1$d apps selected> %1$d items selected> (%1$d selected)> Error sending broadcast: %1$s Not installed! %1$d items selected! items selected. %1$s is already selected!! App not sected / not installed!! Delete List It allows to delete all the values. List Ordering Sorts the list of applications alphabetically App not installed This icon indicates that the application is not installed or some kind of error happened. Value copied to the clipboard Max number of allowed items has been reached. ( max = %1$d ) Long press on items to sort them Activities Actions User Applications ShortCuts Some problem occurred while creating the shortcut!! Error starting the activity. Some type of access/activities/shortcuts just can be executed from system applications. In other cases, it is not possiblie to launch them! Ok Cancel Divider height in lists FAB Button position Force Opposite Position Show Button (FAB) Show Group Buttons Floating Action Button (FAB) Style and Theming Navigation Drawer Other Options Rom and App Help Floating Recents Screens Area Enable Recents Floating Window (long press on FAB) Hide with Back Key Hide touching outside (it is always hiden with back key) Remember Screen Open Options Groups Exit confirmation Finish Exit. Are you sure? Select color Lightness Alpha Auto Color Selection Suggested Colors Preferences Backup Select the new backup name. Do not use extension No valid backup name Backup was ok! Backup already exist Bakcup %1$s already exists. Do you want to overwrite it? Backups dir not found Unknown error while restoring.. Backup Restoration Select the backup to be restored Are you sure you want to restore the backup %1$s ? The backup %1$s was successfully restored. %2$d preferences were found Click: select item color. Double click: Reset item color to its default value. Long click: copy the current item color to the clipboard. You can use it on other item or color preference Color Picker Press to apply Color Pickers Style Circle Flower Square Reboot device? This preference requires the phone to be rebooted to take effect.\nDo you want to reboot your device now? Reboot could not be done. Make sure either your app is inside the privileged folder or your phone is rooted. For now, reboot manually the phone for the changes to take effect. Problem trying rebooting!!! Restart %1$s ? For the change to take effect, this preference needs the following app to be restarted: %1$s\nPress OK to make it now or later manually reboot your phone No root permission!! This action requires root permission for this application!! Authorize this action Are you sure you want to run this action? Are you sure you want to run this scrip: %1$s ? Update Item ROM info App. Pulse Speed (Time On - Time Off) No App Selected It was not possible to screen off to test. Please screen off manually to check the led settings.
A problem occurred while saving the value in settings. Try installing the app in priv-app Drag and drop the elements to short out the list Select Option

Most of the preferences can be reset to their default values by double clicking.
Please, read the help buttons which appear in some preferences. That help will tell you how to delete, sort, or whatever is enabled by the dev.
You can select you default color picker style. This style is only taken if the dev has not defined an specific style for the color preferences or if you are in a preference using a specific style
In color picker preferences you can copy the hex value to the clipboard by long-clicking on the color circle. This feature can be useful when there are many color pickers preferences
Floating Recents Area\n\n - You can enable or disable in this menu. Floating Action Button has to be enabled. Then long-click on it to show the floating area\n - You can change the transparency of the area by double - clicking on the title area\n - You can move the area through the screen by long pressing the title area\n - When the keyboard is needed the floating area is hiden.\n
Some options supported by this app have to be enabled by your rom dev:\n\n - Background image for the Navigation Panel Header\n - Selectable themes\n

General information Features Changelog
Rebased over N950FXXSADTB1
Security patch 01/03/2020
Fixed installer issues
Updated S8+/S8 files [DTC1]
Updated chinese SmartManager
Updated WebView
Simplified AROMA installer
Added dynamic lockscreen
Added one more bootanimation (Deluxe4)
Removed some conflictive/inefficient mods
Rebased over N950FXXS9DTA1
Security patch 01/02/2020
Updated DeluxeKernel® to v12
Rebased over N950FXXS8DSK5
Security patch 01/12/2019
Fixed virtual buttons behavior
Fixed notification colors
Fixed battery capacity on N950F
Improved stock battery hide/show logic
Added option to show percentage on right side
Added custom margins for stock battery
Added custom margins for battery percentage
Added reboot menu custom size for texts
Added reboot menu custom fonts for texts
Added 2 more styles on power menu
Rebased over N950FXXS8DSK1
Security patch 01/11/2019
Updated DeluxeKernel® v11
Updated Magisk v20.1
Updated Busybox 1.31.1
Fixed custom notification colors
Fixed tint issues on quickpanel statusbar
Fixed do-not-disturb icon on statusbar
Forced reboot menu effects (Matrix/Custom background) to use full screen
Added per view option for only apply custom margins to statusbar items
Added quickpanel statusbar items colors
Added tint for battery bar
Added 1 more toggles style
Kept stock notification background on lock screen (Transparency)
Other minor improvements
Rebased over N950FXXU7DSJ1
Security patch 01/10/2019
Updated TWRP to 3.3.1-1
Updated TouchWiz to 10.0.40.6
Updated Magisk to v20
Fixed weather settings force-closing
Fixed duplicated power menu entries
General code cleanup for less resources usage
DRC Improvements
Removed MTP warning
Added bluetooth battery indicator
Added per item position on quickpanel statusbar
Added custom batteries (minit/circle) to quickpanel statusbar
Added option to block notif. panel usage on lockscreen
Added double tap settings on virtual buttons
Added battery bar on status bar
Added 1 more icon style on reboot menu
Added custom text colors on reboot menu (Action/Confirm/Status) (Light/Dark)
Added custom background on reboot menu
Added matrix effect on reboot menu
Added custom color on white background on network speedmeter
Added progressive custom background on notif. panel
Added progressive matrix effect on notif. panel
Added option to force or not the change to manual brightness (Applies for statusbar, virtual buttons and remapped keys)
DeluxeKernel_v10.1 (Always permissive)
Updated S8+/S8 files from september base
Added custom toast animations
Added weather temperature on statusbar
Added ROM version into DeluxeROM® settings section
Stopped TouchWiz auto-updates
Updated S8+/S8 files from latest base
Included UI fix from v18
Added per key options to disable vibration on short press
Added brightness adjustment swiping on statusbar
Added option to use quick reply on secure lockscreen
Added option to remove permanent notifications
Added one more navigation bar style
Rebased over N950FXXS7DSHC
Security patch 01/09/2019
Updated ramdisks
Updated TouchWiz to latest version and added back 4x4
Fixed some CSCs (NZC, PET, TEB, TCE)
Added AC/DC bootanimation
Added languages to pre-install
Added option to use last configuration on AROMA
Added notification led customizations (color, quiet hours, etc…)
Added custom navigation bar icon colors
Added custom size and max. icons on recents
Updated DeluxeKernel®_v10
Moved Snapchat fix to user selection (DRC toggle > Others > Bypass secure flag)
Added back home icon animation (ONLY when using stock icons / theme)
Fixed navigation bar icons behavior after change the order
Added more navigaton bar styles
Added DRC themes; DlxUI (Night/Day automatic), DlxDark and DlxLight
Fixed hidden icons mod (It was reverted sometimes)
Added AROMA option to boot directly with dual statusbar
Removed MultiSIM "Show on expanded panel" option
Rebased over N950FXXS7DSH1

Fixed installer issues

Fixed battery capacity on S8+ / S8

Added navigation bar custom icons
Added notification colors

Added launch Google voice search as custom action (Remap, virtual buttons…)

Skip tracks when screen is off Play/Stop works when the phone is not in deep sleep and a music app has got the audio focus (is playing o was playing not too long ago. When in deep sleep volume keys are not enabled by the system Enable Skip Tracks Double click play/stop music Long press min Time Double Click max Time Vibrate on long and double click The mod uses system feedback vibration intensity, however it is not needed to enable main system switch for vibration feedback Vibration Feedback Intensity

Notifications manager (Led/Sound/Vibrate) Notifications manager Led color, sound and vibration
Led color per app Take in mind the color range of leds are not so big, so, no all colors are possible. Led configuration
Led quiet hours Disable led notifications in a range. If you want to keep it disabled select same start/end time From … To … Enable led quiet hours
